actions.name: Multi Headed
actions.description: Effect: The user's Physical- and Special-Category attacks attacks without [X-Strike] and those with [2-Strike], [3-Strike], or [4-Strike], gain +10% Power for each head the user has (from [X-Headed]). [5-Strike] and above attacks hit an additional number of times for each head the user has (from [X-Headed]).

system.description: Effect: The user's Physical- and Special-Category attacks without [X-Strike] and those with [2-Strike], [3-Strike], or [4-Strike], gain +10% Power for each head the user has (from [X-Headed]). [5-Strike] and above attacks hit an additional number of times for each head the user has (from [X-Headed])
